preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 36.0 g of lithium oxide (Li2O), 99.0 g of titanium dioxide (TiO2), and 45.0 g of titanium (Ti). 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine the lithium oxide and titanium dioxide. 
 3. Gradually add the titanium powder while stirring continuously to ensure an even distribution of the components. 
 4. Mix thoroughly for a minimum of 10 minutes until a uniform powder blend is achieved.
